members.member: Invoked to process a purchase of the product associated with this button
Invoked on a failed purchase of the product associated with this button
Populate a ConfigurationBuilder with products from a ProductCatalog
Invoked to process a purchase of the product associated with this button
Invoked on a failed purchase of the product associated with this button

member.name: T:IAPDemo
member.summary: An example of Unity IAP functionality. To use with your account, configure the product ids (AddProduct).

member.name: M:IAPDemo.OnInitialized(UnityEngine.Purchasing.IStoreController,UnityEngine.Purchasing.IExtensionProvider)
member.summary: This will be called when Unity IAP has finished initialising.

member.name: M:IAPDemo.ProcessPurchase(UnityEngine.Purchasing.PurchaseEventArgs)
member.summary: This will be called when a purchase completes.

member.name: M:IAPDemo.OnPurchaseFailed(UnityEngine.Purchasing.Product,UnityEngine.Purchasing.PurchaseFailureReason)
member.summary: This will be called if an attempted purchase fails.

member.name: M:IAPDemo.OnTransactionsRestored(System.Boolean)
member.summary: This will be called after a call to IAppleExtensions.RestoreTransactions().

member.name: M:IAPDemo.OnDeferred(UnityEngine.Purchasing.Product)
member.summary:
iOS Specific. This is called as part of Apple's 'Ask to buy' functionality, when a purchase is requested by a minor and referred to a parent for approval.
When the purchase is approved or rejected, the normal purchase events will fire.
